function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of strong relationships with suppliers","Impact":"Inability to maintain consistent supply chain during a crisis","Mitigation":"Invest in building long-term relationships with reliable suppliers","Technologies":"Supplier relationship management software","People":"Retailers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Dependence on single suppliers","Impact":"Vulnerability to disruptions in supply chain","Mitigation":"Diversify supplier base, create strategic partnerships with multiple suppliers","Technologies":"Supply chain analytics, risk assessment tools","People":"Retailers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain managers"},{"Description":"Lack of agility in supply chain","Impact":"Inability to adapt to changes in demand or supply during a crisis","Mitigation":"Implement agile supply chain practices, invest in advanced forecasting and demand planning","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics","People":"Retailers, supply chain managers","Owner":"Retailers, supply chain managers"}]}
